channel.title: How do i make party hats and mime appear?
channel.description: I saw my friend do it before its like pickup :: 1032 55 or something like that, is there a thread about this?

item.title: How do i make party hats and mime appear?
item.dc:creator: @us_sniper04 us sniper04
item.description:
@us_sniper04 wrote:

ok go to your moparscape 3.2 w\ aryan and click on the help link on the top bar. then you click on item ids and search for partyhat…btw the numbers are 1038 - 1049…odds are the codes you use for multipule phats.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make party hats and mime appear?

item.title: How do i make party hats and mime appear?
item.dc:creator: @Click_Here Click Here
item.description:
@Click_Here wrote:

umm, liek i said, by right clicking on a party hat, there will be a 4 digit number. thats the spawn code.

item.title: How do i make party hats and mime appear?
item.dc:creator: @Click_Here Click Here
item.description:
@Click_Here wrote:

all you have to do id right click on an item and theres a 4 number code, thats the item spawn code so lets say mime was 5555, which its not, then you would type ::pickup 5555 1

Read full topic
